subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hi, New Member from UK
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Welcome to the group. Yes it seems pretty normal that it works that way. It's always good to record to catch what you may miss hearing yourself. Glad its going well for you!

Misty


--- On Fri, 9/12/08, tonyandsue13 <tonyandsue13@...> wrote:

> From: tonyandsue13 <tonyandsue13@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Hi, New Member from UK
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Friday, September 12, 2008, 9:56 PM
> Within the last week I came across the concept of the ghost
> box 
> (Frank's box) and have had immediate results.
> 
> This is actually using a mobile phone on radio mode with a
> manual scan, 
> simply holding down the button and it scans through the FM
> bands either 
> up or down. There was no white noise being played at the
> same time nor 
> on review.
> 
> What surprised me was the clarity of the answers to direct
> questions 
> which could then be checked on a reviewing the tape. But
> also that on 
> one ocassion the replies weren't audible until the
> replay of the taped 
> session was heard.
> 
> Is this typical?
> 
> I can upload the sessions which are quite interesting due
> to the 
> subject being discussed.
